Empath::

"Windlord ..."  Empath hesitates for a moment, then puts her hands on 
his shoulders.  "Thank you."  She draws her companion into a kiss.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airshadow Nightstar" <airly2002@h...> 
wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> "That would be a power that I wouldn't like use, dear Empath" 
replied kindly 
> the male while he touched kindly her cheek "Freedom is the right of 
every 
> being with knowlege of its own existence..."
> 
> >From: "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" <cardhead649@y...>
> >Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> >To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> >Subject: Re: Inner thoughts (airly read)
> >Date: Tue, 07 Jan 2003 17:16:24 -0000
> >
> >Empath::
> >
> >The femme shudders as she finally breaks the contact.  "I've never
> >done that before," she admits, "not even with Skywarp.  I never 
felt
> >safe opening my own mind to anyone else - it makes me vulnerable.
> >Whether you realized it or not at the time, you could have trapped 
me
> >under your direct control forever."
> >
> >--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airshadow Nightstar" 
<airly2002@h...>
> >wrote:
> > > Windlord::
> > >
> > > Windlord Opened his mind and he could feel the pain and sorrow 
the
> >EMphath
> > > felt. He could understand all, after he saw all her life.
> > >
> > > "Empath" thought Windlord while the compassion and his love
> >arrose "How did
> > > you suffer, my dear Empath..."
> > >
> > >
> > > >From: "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" <cardhead649@y...>
> > > >Empath::
> > > >
> > > >The most direct route has usually worked best for Empath.  She
> >turns
> > > >toward Windlord and gently places her hands on either side of 
his
> > > >head.  "It's easier to show you than tell you," she 
says.  "Try to
> > > >relax - I won't hurt you."
> > > >
> > > >She reaches out with her mind, drawing Windlord's feelings for 
her
> >to
> > > >the surface.  Empath's gratified to learn that her initial
> >assessment
> > > >was correct, but she's not done.  Briefly, she opens her own 
mind
> >to
> > > >the Maximal, allowing him to see all she's seen - from her 
creation
> > > >millions of years ago, through the Great War, to the pain of 
losing
> > > >Skywarp to Galvatron's selfish machinations.  She shows him the
> > > >reformatting, when she became a predacon trapped under 
Galvatron's
> > > >control; finding the Soul Orb and accidentally freeing 
herself; and
> > > >finally, she shows the recent events that have drawn them to 
this
> > > >moment - and the fact that her own emotions mirror his.
